channel.title: Server VPS
channel.description:
Okay, so I haven't started my server yet, but im buying a vps... Which should I use? And how would I set it up? What would I choose for a RSPS?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Server VPS
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

[quote=“Bells, post:4, topic:440859”][quote author=dzeko link=topic=543535.msg3983977#msg3983977 date=1335646596]
Buying a VPS before setting up your server is really stupid lol…

Your 1 month will start as soon as you buy it, they wont wait you to get your server up lol.

I’m lucky, i’ve find a 14$/m 1gb VPS, but most of them are like 20$/m.
And you need to activate it by phone or send them a copy of your lisence card lol(VPSLand).
[/quote]
VPSLand is shit, don’t advertise it too be so great. Their’s VPS’s way cheaper and with better customer support.[/quote]
-_____-
I’m saying that VPSLand is shit and that you have to send them a copy of your lisence to activate it…

Read full topic

item.title: Server VPS
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You should probably get a server started, and cleaned before you go ahead and dedicate to buying a VPS. They don’t usually come cheap.

Read full topic
